DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 study consist 3 visit 3 week period conduct 5 site . The purpose study determine effective combination Pred Mild® FOV1101-00 compare either Pred Forte® alone vehicle alone prevention eye allergy . Study subject randomize one following : - FOV1101-00 concentration 1 Pred Mild® - FOV1101-00 concentration 2 Pred Mild® - Vehicle FOV1101-00 Pred Forte® - Vehicle FOV1101-00 Vehicle FOV1101-00
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Coadministration FOV1101-00 Prednisolone Acetate Patients With Mild Ongoing Ocular Allergic Inflammation
DOC.criteria: history ocular allergy positive skin test reaction allergen within past 24 month history chronic eye irritation ; active ocular infection ; clinically significant blepharitis ; follicular conjunctivitis ; iritis ; type glaucoma ; ocular surgery within past 3 month ; pregnancy nursing
